sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function CartTotals({value}) { const{cartSubTotal, cartTax,cartTotal} = value; const{clearCart} = value; return (
subtotal : ${(Math.round(cartSubTotal * 100) / 100).toFixed(2)}
tax : ${(Math.round(cartTax * 100) / 100).toFixed(2)}
total : ${(Math.round(cartTotal * 100) / 100).toFixed(2)}
) }
